translation.en: Guys, that jerk off to CrossFit?

The sun's a little brighter, the air's a little cleaner.

You've got a great ass, a 1520 on the PSAT.

My dad took me hunting last fall. It was awesome.
[imitates gunshot] Shot Bambi in the brain.
You know, when the end of the world comes, we eat the vegans first.

Joy helps people with serious issues, chronic depression, OCD.

translation.en: -I'm sure we can work this out. -You… threatened my daughter.

how many people can do your job, Dave?

what do you think they're going to do, Dave?

but their sense of smell it keeps getting better.

translation.ko: - 그래서 죽은 놈들이 달라붙었군 - 죽은 건 아니야

translation.en: All they want to do is eat and spread the virus.

Really fucking big and really fucking mean.

[inhales deeply] We need to understand it. Them.

translation.en: I get how to kill 'em. I'm good.
There's, what, 300 million humans left on this planet?
I don't think you can kill them all.
So we have to learn how to live with them.
AIDS or Ebola or anything else that's trying to wipe out the human race.
-I didn't make no fucking zero… -[liquid sloshing] -[bottle thuds] -…and I didn't end the fucking world.

I just need to get pictures and put them online,

-You think Dad will be okay with that? -I…

and whose password to everything is Spock21?
